dialogList.content: O—Oh, alright... I'll just leave it to you, then.
Please, just... just don't tell them that I'm here, alright?
Alright then... Let's head this way.
Huh, how strange... I can't seem to find any...
O—Oh, it's you! What are you doing here? Is something the matter?
You'd been gone for some time, we decided to come looking for you.
Oh, I see. No need to worry, there hasn't been any sign of danger. I'm just here to gather some red <color=#00E1FFFF>Wolfhook</color> berries, that's all.
But the strange thing is, there should be lots of them here... and I can't seem to find any.
Hmm, anyway, no need to worry about me. I'll just have another look around here, and if I can't find any, I'll just—
Huh? Somebody seems to be coming this way!
Oh, I'm sorry, but... please, just keep quiet, okay? Don't let them find us...
Why would you want to hide?
